title: Community Book Club: "The Great Gatsby"
description: Join fellow literature lovers for a relaxed discussion of F. Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel. Light snacks provided.

title: Farmers Market Cooking Demo
description: Watch and learn how to make fresh summer dishes with local produce. Recipes provided.

title: Container Gardening Basics
description: Learn how to grow vegetables and herbs in containers, perfect for patios or small spaces.

title: Watercolors in the Park
description: Enjoy a casual plein air painting session—no experience needed. Supplies provided.

title: Memoir Writing Circle
description: Share your life stories and gain feedback in this supportive, peer-led writing group.

title: Knit & Sip Meetup
description: Bring your needles and favorite pattern. Complimentary coffee for all participants.

title: Beginner's Trail Walk
description: Easy-paced hike on a scenic loop. Benches and shaded paths available.

title: Nature Photography Stroll
description: Capture the beauty of seasonal blooms while learning basic photo techniques.

title: Armchair Travelers Club: Italy
description: A virtual “trip” through Italy with slides, stories, and cultural treats.

title: Golden Grooves: Social Dance Night
description: Swing, waltz, and line dance—no partner needed. Wheelchair accessible dance floor.

title: Chair Yoga for All Levels
description: A gentle yoga class using chairs for support, ideal for all mobility levels.

title: Morning Fishing at the Lake
description: Bring your gear and enjoy a quiet morning of catch-and-release fishing. Permits provided.

title: Birding for Beginners
description: Early morning birdwalk with guide. Binoculars available to borrow.

title: Intro to Woodshop Safety & Tools
description: Learn basic woodworking skills and get hands-on in a guided project.

title: Community Jam Session
description: Bring your instrument and join an inclusive, no-pressure music jam.

title: Baking with Berries
description: Hands-on class to make simple berry tarts using seasonal ingredients.

title: Adaptive Biking Hour
description: Ride using a variety of adaptive bikes for different abilities. Helmets provided.

title: Memory Book Craft Hour
description: Preserve your favorite memories with paper craft and embellishments. Supplies included.

title: Food Pantry Volunteer Morning
description: Help sort and pack food items for local families. Light lifting required.

title: Guided Sound Bowl Meditation
description: Unwind with deep breathing and sound healing in a calm, cozy space.
